text: Really friendly service. I have not eaten a pizza from dominoes, Pappa John's ect. In a long time and decided to get a stuffed crust pizza like who I remember as a child. It was very good. I enjoyed the good service on picking up the pizza. I would recommend this location for pickup.

text: This place is horrible!!! The pizza horrible, breadstick even worse and the marinara sauce tastes as if it were expired. Order from another Pizza Hut! It also doesnâ€™t even smell like pizza there. It smells like a wet mop. Never again!

text: 100% better service than the other one on elden st. When you ask for double meats or pepperoni, you actually receive it. :-) Although they don't deliver to my location, its worth the drive if I am craving the american pizza of my childhood.
